segment.source: Configuring Management or Streaming Server for Secure Communications Post-Installation
segment.target: Configuring Management or Streaming Server for Secure Communications Post-Installation

segment.source: Configuring Management or Streaming Server for Secure Communications Post-Installation
segment.target: Configuring Management or Streaming Server for Secure Communications Post-Installation

segment.source: Configuring Management or Streaming Server for Secure Communications Post-Installation
segment.target: Configuring Management or Streaming Server for Secure Communications Post-Installation

segment.source: If the proper certificate was not provisioned before the installation of the App-V Management Server or the App-V Streaming Server, App-V can be configured for enhanced security after the initial installation.
segment.target: If the proper certificate was not provisioned before the installation of the App-V Management Server or the App-V Streaming Server, App-V can be configured for enhanced security after the initial installation.

segment.source: You can configure the App-V Management Server through the App-V Management Console.
segment.target: You can configure the App-V Management Server through the App-V Management Console.

segment.source: However, the App-V Streaming Server is managed through the registry.
segment.target: However, the App-V Streaming Server is managed through the registry.

segment.source: In either case, the certificate must include the proper extended key usage (EKU) for Server authentication and the Network Service must have read access to the private key.
segment.target: In either case, the certificate must include the proper extended key usage (EKU) for Server authentication and the Network Service must have read access to the private key.

segment.source: How to Configure Management Server Security Post-Installation
segment.target: How to Configure Management Server Security Post-Installation

segment.source: Provides a procedure that can be performed post-installation, using the App-V Management Console, to add the certificate and configure the App-V Management Server for enhanced security.
segment.target: Provides a procedure that can be performed post-installation, using the App-V Management Console, to add the certificate and configure the App-V Management Server for enhanced security.

segment.source: How to Configure Streaming Server Security Post-Installation
segment.target: How to Configure Streaming Server Security Post-Installation

segment.source: Provides a procedure that can be performed post-installation, to add the certificate and configure the App-V Streaming Server for enhanced security.
segment.target: Provides a procedure that can be performed post-installation, to add the certificate and configure the App-V Streaming Server for enhanced security.

segment.source: Provides troubleshooting guidance for when the private key has not been configured with the proper ACL for the Network Service.
segment.target: Provides troubleshooting guidance for when the private key has not been configured with the proper ACL for the Network Service.
